author: alfasilverblade

text: @Cordiiiii That's a cute story Cordiiiii :).  I did something similar with my little sister.  Back in 1994 (I was 13 she was 3) I was playing Final Fantasy VI and I was grinding my characters to high levels, and I let her play for awhile.  I told her how to move the character around the world map and when a battle would happen I told her to press the one button (attack) over and over.  I had no chance of dying and she helped me gain some experience, and she got to play a little bit.
author: crcyclone

text:
I'm SO happy that you actually included a song from SoE in this playlist :))
I remember when I was about 4 years old I always wanted to play that game along with my older brother... I kept complaining and complaining and finally my brother gave me the 2nd gamepad and told me I could play the dog... Now we all know there is no 2 player mode in that game but I didn't know and I didn't really notice... So I was happy and kept my mouth shut "playing" the dog... :DD And my brother had some peace :D
author: Cordiiiii
